programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: Quinn and Velazquez uncover the secret life of a young mother when she is found murdered, the victim of a psychopathic killer preying on high class prostiitutes.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.desc: Yvette Gay is a simple girl desperate for companionship and when she falls for an angry man, he drags her into a murderous plot. Vishawn Mills finds the man of her dreams but when an innocent friendship with the landlord intimidates her jealous boyfriend, her dream becomes a nightmare.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: The most populous city in the state of Illinois, Chicago is a major cultural hub, but when a promising young life is cut short in a local park, a community bands together to demand real change in the South Side’s gang-riddled neighborhoods

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: When 22-year-old airport baggage handler Erika Yancey goes missing, friends and family scramble with law enforcement to find her. Erika had a habit of meeting strangers online, which leads her family to fear that she may have gotten caught up with the wrong person. But once the search gets going, a steamy affair and a tangled love triangle will be revealed that will send the case spiraling in a whole new direction. The question isn’t only if they’ll find Erika…it’s if they’ll find her alive.

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: Abraham Kennard was a fast-talking pastor with an ambitious real estate investment opportunity. Hundreds of pastors and parishioners from churches across the country were lured by Kennard’s lavish lifestyle and promises of enormous returns. But though the millions poured in, the returns never poured out, revealing this supposed man of God…to be a man of greed.

programme.title: #Murder
programme.desc: 14-year-old Shaniesha Forbes, was your typical American teenager. If she wasn’t hanging out with family or friends, she was busy scrolling through facebook, planning her next event on her busy social calendar. But when Shaniesha failed to come home from school or answer her phone in January of 2013, her mother knew something was terribly wrong. The search for the truth would expose the dark side of social media.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: Demetrius Robbins was a stand-up husband and father who made it a point to serve his family, until one night where the unthinkable happened. Quinn and Vince go from a crime scene where there is no body, to rapidly piecing together that Demetrius Robbins is the victim in a much larger and horrific crime that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not
programme.desc: With fitness being his main focus, Gordon Kimbrough is de-railed when he meets his match in Kristy Ramsey and losing her may prove to be too much for him to bear. Then, Dwayne Moore lived life based on his own rules until his mother marries Jimmy McClain and talk of a new life pushes him to his limit.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.desc: Vanessa Coleman is dangerously in love. She’ll stand by her man as he tortures a frightened couple in a drug-induced rage all while she watches. Then Tamika Jasper-Barbary marries a handsome, hard worker, but when his job gets them in hot water, Tamika risks it all to save her love.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: In 2013, Cleveland, Ohio is shaken when 911 dispatchers receive a call and three missing women are found in a house of horrors. Investigators uncover the truth behind a horrific string of decade old abductions committed by a city school bus driver.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction-Dupe
programme.desc: When 22-year-old airport baggage handler Erika Yancey goes missing, friends and family scramble with law enforcement to find her. Erika had a habit of meeting strangers online, which leads her family to fear that she may have gotten caught up with the wrong person. But once the search gets going, a steamy affair and a tangled love triangle will be revealed that will send the case spiraling in a whole new direction. The question isn’t only if they’ll find Erika…it’s if they’ll find her alive.↵↵

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: Quinn and Velazquez uncover the secret life of a young mother when she is found murdered, the victim of a psychopathic killer preying on high class prostiitutes.

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: When hopeless romantic Rose Anglade met Paul Francois, she thought the Lord had finally given her someone she could grow old with. Eager to begin her new life with the man of her dreams, Rose takes Paul’s advice and sells her home in New York City and shares her assets with her soul mate. But unbeknownst to Rose, her smooth talking lothario has been carefully orchestrating his control over her finances, and when Francois disappears, it isn't just her money that he's taken.

programme.title: #Murder
programme.desc: 15-year-old Mikarah Sanders and 16-year-old Matthew DuBois were two typical teenagers in a whirlwind romance. The two were inseparable; when they weren’t together, they were messaging on MySpace. But when a New Year’s Eve in Seattle ends in the mysterious shooting of Mikarah and Matthew, police scour social media to piece together the crime. Their search for answers would reveal a tale of jealousy, rage, and the murder of an innocent teen.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide

The APD were called and they discovered that he was murdered inside his own home. Quinn and Vince rush to the scene only to discover that people who you love and hold dearest to your heart, can make it stop beating.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not

programme.title: For My Man

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: When a beloved high school football player dies while shielding three girls from bullets in a random shooting, a city comes together to seek justice for a young life lost.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: Eddy Curry and Nova Henry have a relationship that turns rocky once Eddy is drafted to the NBA and she has two of his children. But when Nova and her 10-month old daughter Ava turn up dead in the wake of a child support case, police are baffled as to what monster could commit such a heinous crime.

programme.title: Deceived

When the time comes to sign a management agency, Corey is convinced by local agents that they are the only agents that will look out for his true interests - the only agents he can trust. But while everything seems to run smoothly at first, Corey is soon faced with money problems, despite a substantial signing bonus he received when he was drafted. programme.title: Thou Shalt Not

programme.title: Sins of the City

Rumors were swirling that someone threatened to kill Ivan on Facebook, but the post had since been deleted. Detectives turn to cyberspace to unlock the mystery behind a murder sparked by social media, and fueled by jealousy and wounded pride.

programme.title: Sins of the City

programme.title: Crime Files
programme.desc: For years, a powerful New Jersey sheriff sexually abused kids in custody. County officials were warned but did nothing to stop it. News12 unravels three decades of secrets and follows the victims on their quest for justice.

programme.title: Crime Files
programme.desc: In 2016, Sara Stern's car was found on a bridge in Belmar, NJ, leading to speculation she had committed suicide. It was later revealed her childhood friend, Sean McAtasney, had murdered her for her inheritance money. He later confessed to the crime..

programme.title: Crime Files

programme.title: Crime Files
programme.desc: In 1990 Det. Dennis Wustenhoff was killed by an explosive hidden in his car. Today the crime is still unsolved.

programme.title: Crime Files

programme.title: Crime Files
programme.desc: It sounds like the plot of a movie. A rookie cop finds out other officers are taking money from the (Cuban) mob and goes undercover for the FBI.

programme.title: Crime Files
programme.desc: William Walsh Jr. is serving 18 years to life for the murder of his wife, Leah. When Leah confronted her husband about other women, their fight turned physical..left his wife's lifeless body in their Long Island apartment, later confessed to murder.

programme.title: Crime Files
programme.desc: Unsolved murders, romance scams, mysterious disappearances. Each week we'll feature high-profile crime stories from NY, NJ and CT as told by the victims, detectives and our journalists.

programme.title: Crime Files

programme.title: Crime Files

programme.title: Crime Files
programme.desc: His crimes made him an international story, and his death left a haunting legacy of unsolved questions and unresolved justice. Robert Durst, a wealthy real estate heir embroiled in legal controversies and criminal investigations, was convicted of....

programme.title: Crime Files
programme.desc: When Stephani Parze went missing, her family found themselves caught in a recurring nightmare. For 87 days, they and police searched for Stephanie. Her body was eventually found and prosecutors concluded she was killed by an obsessed ex-boyfriend....

programme.title: Crime Files

programme.title: Crime Files
programme.desc: On June 28, 1993, NY State Troopers tried to pull over a landscaper who was driving around with a missing license plate. That routine traffic stop ended with a high-speed chase, a crash, and the discovery of a dead body inside Joel Rifkin's truck.

programme.title: In Flight
programme.desc: In this episode we meet the animals of Africa. We'll see how the zebra able to use its stripes as camouflage against its colorblind nemesis. Explore the engineering of a giraffes neck, and feel the power of a hyena jaws.

programme.title: Predator and Prey
programme.desc: In this episode, we find out how the Jaguar's spots create a disruptive pattern that makes them harder for prey to see. We'll also learn how a bee sting really works, and how a salmon is able to migrate thousands of miles to spawn.

programme.title: Plants
programme.desc: Host Philippe Cousteau takes us to the Poconos of Pennsylvania, where we find a variety of plants, including some that eat insects. We explore a lush forest and uncover several plants that are edible. We visit a laboratory that has made groundbreaking discoveries in the way plants communicate.

programme.title: Fire and Ice
programme.desc: Host Philippe Cousteau explores the cause of recent forest fires. We examine the nature of lightning strikes and how scientists are tracking them. We visit the country of Iceland and venture onto a large glacier and explore an ice cave. We also discover why glaciers are melting and how this will change the sea level

programme.title: Fabulous Felines
programme.desc: In this episode, we examine the science of the cat. We'll learn about the evolution of cats throughout the world, featuring the Saber-tooth Tiger. Find out how cat senses stack up against other animals. And take a pop quiz that reveals some incredible feline facts.

programme.title: Australian Animals
programme.desc: In this episode we travel to the land down under - Australia. Learn the science behind the one of the world's largest natural wonders, the Great Barrier Reef. See the ferocity of the Tasmanian devil, and meet the cute and cuddly Koala Bear.

programme.title: Oregon Coast
programme.desc: Jefferson Graham takes us on a photowalk through Oregon Coast

programme.title: Santa Fe, New Mexico
programme.desc: Jefferson Graham tours Santa Fe, New Mexico and shows us how to capture the best photos of the city's beautiful landmarks with your phone.

programme.title: Station Nightclub Fire
programme.desc: A survivor reflects on The Station nightclub fire on February 20, 2003 in West Warwick, Rhode Island. One hundred people died and more than 200 were injured. The fire was sparked by pyrotechnics that went off during metal band, Great White's performance. The episode looks at who did and didn't take responsibility for the fire and fire code safety measures that have changed since.

programme.title: Surfside Collapse
programme.desc: On June 24, 2021, the Champlain Towers South, a beachfront condominium in the Miami suburb of Surfside, Florida partially collapsed, killing 98 people. Family members of victims and a WPTV anchor reflect on the tragedy. The episode looks at changes in building codes and laws and research on saltwater corrosion.

programme.title: The Inside Story
programme.desc: In collaboration with "The Marshall Project." In-depth stories on criminal justice - including health care in prisons and jails, staff shortages and controversial forensic evidence.

programme.title: The Inside Story
programme.desc: In collaboration with "The Marshall Project." In-depth stories on criminal justice - including health care in prisons and jails, staff shortages and controversial forensic evidence.

programme.title: Good To Know
programme.desc: Discover inspirational news, with real-life stories of everyday people who positively impact their communities.

programme.title: Good To Know
programme.desc: Discover inspirational news, with real-life stories of everyday people who positively impact their communities.

programme.title: Homeless Hero
programme.desc: Can NYC's ambitious "housing-first" program end the mental health crisis on the city's streets?

programme.title: #SaveTheBees
programme.desc: Beekeepers are hoping to save the declining bee population by making them social media famous.

programme.title: Partners In Evil
programme.desc: Two ex-marines join forces for one sole nefarious purpose – to abduct women and keep them as sex slaves. This evil duo carries out their "operation" with military precision, unafraid to kill innocent civilians along the way, until a petty crime unravels their sinister plans.

programme.title: The Venomous Veterinarian
programme.desc: The disappearance of a decorated military man stumps law enforcement and shocks a central Texas community. But once investigators dig into his home life, they uncover a vicious murder plot involving his veterinarian wife.

programme.title: In Search Of A Kill
programme.desc: A drug abuser out on a joy ride kidnaps, then kills, an innocent coed in Oregon. Investigators spend months attempting to solve what they believe is a missing person until the perpetrator strikes again 1400 miles away and provides law enforcement with a critical link to his criminal past.

programme.title: Terror On The Strip
programme.desc: A serial killer with a history of serial rape terrorizes Tampa, Florida's red light district, targeting women of the night at random. This killer gets away with murder for months, only to be brought to justice by the one victim he let go.

programme.title: Master Bob
programme.desc: A Michigan town is in disbelief after a well-respected real estate entrepreneur becomes the prime suspect in his wife's murder. The investigation into the homicide uncovers a sordid tale of double lives, sadomasochism and a callous murder-for-hire scheme involving a mentally handicapped handyman.

programme.title: The House Of Horrors
programme.desc: A former army medic devises a sick plan to kidnap women, impregnate them and keep them in his basement as part of a personal baby farm. When the plans turn to actions, two women lose their lives and four others experience the hell of a veritable house of horrors.

programme.title: A Wolf In Woman's Clothing
programme.desc: The murder of a millionaire doctor's wife sets off a massive manhunt throughout New England. Law enforcement quickly locates the suspected killer only to find out he has a history of not only violence, but also cross-dressing.

programme.title: Murderous Miranda
programme.desc: An unemployed teen mom and her new husband concoct a plan to kill an innocent man they meet on Craigslist. The end result is a vicious stabbing that sends shockwaves through a small Pennsylvania community. Yet, what's even more shocking is that this may not even be the wife's first homicide.

programme.title: Rickwood
programme.desc: This is the story of the oldest professional ballpark in the U.S. and the determination of its home team, the Black Barons. The voice of Rickwood tells the tale of its pivotal role in The Negro League, Black history and its legacy in American sports.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.desc: Sink your teeth into the Midwest's sweets. From the messy madness of puppy chow to kolaches to the infamous buckeye, enjoy the delicious confections that make the region a haven for dessert lovers.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Every little bit helps! Justin and Ryan prove how true that is by throwing a fundraiser to help a woman in Maine get to have a place to call her own.

programme.title: FIXT: Veteran Faces Terrifying Decision
programme.desc: Andrew returned home from serving his country with a toothache so bad he covers his mouth out of habit. Mickey had forgotten how to smile after years of struggle with addiction and abuse. Will the FIXT team help them smile again?

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Human Race by Runner's World
programme.desc: Runner-in-Chief Jeff Dengate, presents inspiring runner stories from around the country. Meet runners from Colorado, New Jersey, Kentucky and Pennsylvania who are making a difference.

programme.title: This is Iowa
programme.desc: A Decade of Stories

programme.title: Underdog Uprising
programme.desc: Every game day, fans pour into the stands to cheer on New Mexico's soccer team. But these are no ordinary supporters. From the Curse, to Sektor 114, to the Black Diamonds these fans are making New Mexico United.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: What’s vast, adventure-packed, and sunscreen-free? Boston’s great indoors! Rob tries his hand at everything from indoor surfing to skydiving on his day in.

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.desc: B-Girl Crystál Zamora joins Amanda for a classic breakfast with a New Mexican twist, break dance lessons with a challenge at the end, and an art studio that doesn’t just allow you to make a mess… but encourages it.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Daniel Johnson juggles three jobs and is a single father to three kids. Kinga meets with Daniel in Pittsburgh, PA to help him ‘clock out’, reconnect with nature, and experience some quality “me time.”

programme.title: The Spark
programme.desc: A’lores C. Norris finds inspiration and purpose in creating an inclusive space within the makeup industry. She shares her story of creating her makeup brand and a community of empowerment.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.desc: It’s time to saddle up as three Oklahoma natives pull themselves to victory creating original screen print deigns encapsulating the Old West. Do these makers have the true grit it takes to be Maker Nation Champion?

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Dreams come true while visiting a long-time fan and cancer survivor on their way to Louisville. Ryan wears a blindfold during a batting cage challenge with Jimmy, and a couple living behind the batting cage receive help getting back on their feet.

programme.title: In Transit by Esquire
programme.desc: Esquire’s Dave Holmes and chef and author Ronnie Woo share must-sees in Milwaukee!

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Relive the '50s, sip smokin’ cocktails, and discover salty licorice fish in Amish country's hidden gem.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.desc: Why is Kansas City's fashion scene thriving? Craving a horchata latte? Best pizza on planet Earth? Local experts Jordan Gallant, Jasmine Green, and Aaron Rahsaan Thomas have all the answers, including where to go for a new hairstyle and a pep talk.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A teen murdered but no suspects. A woman allegedly killed by a panhandler

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: Luke is a Kansas City bachelor who is finally ready to settle down. He’s purging the dating apps and hoping to find the perfect match. He’ll meet three blind dates as they play pickleball, get their shuffleboard on and visit a llama farm.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: We celebrate the contributions of those who brought their hopes, dreams and talents with them to the United States. You’ll also see the generosity of those who look beyond our borders to make a difference in the lives of those around the world.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Sometimes, would-be criminals are their own worst enemies. This episode highlights crime “fails,” and the officers - and ordinary civilians - who save the day.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: Six people are slain in a home in a quiet Iowa town. One person survives a gunshot to the head and claims to have no memory of the incident. The tragedy and eventual trial shred the social fabric of the neighborhood.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: The brutal murders of two trans women of color just 48 hours apart in New Orleans unsettle the community, leaving many wondering if the cases are connected. Detectives uncover clues, yet justice remains elusive.

programme.title: This is Iowa
programme.desc: Iowa has experienced a lot of tough headlines in 2024. But in both Perry and Greenfield, tears have been followed by generosity from countless strangers. Witness the impact of the good Iowans who show up to help when the news is tough

programme.title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.desc: A stranger than fiction documentary that chronicles a semi-scripted extreme sporting league that premiered in 2000. Socker Slam took elements of wrestling, rugby and “butts up” shenanigans and body slammed them into a soccer drama.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.desc: David suffered from a blood disorder and hasn’t had a full set of teeth since he was 12. Heather struggles with a rare genetic condition that put her in dentures in her 20s. Can the FIXT team write the final chapter in their health journeys?

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: Join host Rob Mariano, also known as Boston Rob from the Survivor series, as he explores the best of Beantown from classic institutions to new local gems.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.desc: Makers, crafters and artists square off to create the most iconic art piece that best represents their city. From glass-blowers and chalk artists to metalsmiths and tattooers, see who Host Ashley Adams and the judges will crown the victor.

programme.title: Matter of Fact
programme.desc: This week Matter of Fact travels to North Carolina to see how clean energy is bringing relief to remote communities after Hurricane Helene. programme.title: Fabulous Felines
programme.desc: In this episode, we examine the science of the cat. We'll learn about the evolution of cats throughout the world, featuring the Saber-tooth Tiger. Find out how cat senses stack up against other animals. And take a pop quiz that reveals some incredible feline facts.

programme.title: Australian Animals
programme.desc: In this episode we travel to the land down under - Australia. Learn the science behind the one of the world's largest natural wonders, the Great Barrier Reef. See the ferocity of the Tasmanian devil, and meet the cute and cuddly Koala Bear.

programme.title: Oregon Coast
programme.desc: Jefferson Graham takes us on a photowalk through Oregon Coast

programme.title: Santa Fe, New Mexico
programme.desc: Jefferson Graham tours Santa Fe, New Mexico and shows us how to capture the best photos of the city's beautiful landmarks with your phone.

programme.title: Station Nightclub Fire
programme.desc: A survivor reflects on The Station nightclub fire on February 20, 2003 in West Warwick, Rhode Island. One hundred people died and more than 200 were injured. The fire was sparked by pyrotechnics that went off during metal band, Great White's performance. The episode looks at who did and didn't take responsibility for the fire and fire code safety measures that have changed since.

programme.title: Surfside Collapse
programme.desc: On June 24, 2021, the Champlain Towers South, a beachfront condominium in the Miami suburb of Surfside, Florida partially collapsed, killing 98 people. Family members of victims and a WPTV anchor reflect on the tragedy. The episode looks at changes in building codes and laws and research on saltwater corrosion.

programme.desc: In collaboration with "The Marshall Project." In-depth stories on criminal justice - including health care in prisons and jails, staff shortages and controversial forensic evidence.

programme.title: #SaveTheBees
programme.desc: Beekeepers are hoping to save the declining bee population by making them social media famous.

programme.title: Partners In Evil
programme.desc: Two ex-marines join forces for one sole nefarious purpose – to abduct women and keep them as sex slaves. This evil duo carries out their "operation" with military precision, unafraid to kill innocent civilians along the way, until a petty crime unravels their sinister plans.

programme.title: The Venomous Veterinarian
programme.desc: The disappearance of a decorated military man stumps law enforcement and shocks a central Texas community. But once investigators dig into his home life, they uncover a vicious murder plot involving his veterinarian wife.

programme.title: In Search Of A Kill
programme.desc: A drug abuser out on a joy ride kidnaps, then kills, an innocent coed in Oregon. Investigators spend months attempting to solve what they believe is a missing person until the perpetrator strikes again 1400 miles away and provides law enforcement with a critical link to his criminal past.

programme.title: Terror On The Strip
programme.desc: A serial killer with a history of serial rape terrorizes Tampa, Florida's red light district, targeting women of the night at random. This killer gets away with murder for months, only to be brought to justice by the one victim he let go.

programme.title: Master Bob
programme.desc: A Michigan town is in disbelief after a well-respected real estate entrepreneur becomes the prime suspect in his wife's murder. The investigation into the homicide uncovers a sordid tale of double lives, sadomasochism and a callous murder-for-hire scheme involving a mentally handicapped handyman.

programme.title: The House Of Horrors
programme.desc: A former army medic devises a sick plan to kidnap women, impregnate them and keep them in his basement as part of a personal baby farm. When the plans turn to actions, two women lose their lives and four others experience the hell of a veritable house of horrors.

programme.title: A Deadly Druglord
programme.desc: Vicente Fuentes' cartel is responsible for mass murders and billions in drug trafficking. Plus, one of the most popular and longest serving U.S. mayors is accused of running a corrupt criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Murder In The Basement
programme.desc: Up-and-coming actress, Alexandra Ducsay, is murdered in her own home. For years, this cold case goes unsolved until a key piece of evidence resurfaces years later. Plus, the downfall of a prominent leader of the pro-independence movement that sought to establish statehood for Taiwan.
